snippet.title: Sucker Punch Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Like Pong on VR fueled roids!
Sucker Punch VR is a fast-paced, arcade punch-fest!
An easy to play but difficult to master game of head-to-head action. Wielding an arsenal of power gloves you'll punch, parry, and strike your way to victory by scoring cubes past your opponent while preventing cubes from getting past you!

Featuring:
- Fast-paced and fun! Easy to learn and a blast to master.

- An arsenal of gloves, each with unique powers. Mix and match to find your play style and tactics.

- Drones! Equip a buddy drone. They'll be your pal, your amigo, and your sidekick to help you to victory!

- Gain XP. Level up. Unlock...and power up!

- Single-player: Choose your level and match yourself against progressively harder AI opponents.

- League play with progressively more difficult divisions and trophies to win.
- Multiplayer: Go head-to-head with a friend.

- Daily Challenges: A new and unique challenge each day. Can you get the highest score on the global leader board?

- A diverse selection of arenas to play.

- New gloves, powers, and arenas are added regularly.

Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491400/Sucker_Punch/

Sucker Punch VR Connections:
Website: https://www.suckerpunchvr.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SuckerPunchVR

*All game play footage captured on Oculus Quest
